column4: typically: "make && make install" will compile and install.  Whatever you've got there doesn't look overly official though, you'd better make sure you trust the source.  There appears to be no configure so if you need any dev libraries installed you'll have to do it yourself.
so i just execute make Makefile or make install Makefile?
I was hoping someone would give you the link like guntbert did.  I don't do bot magic.
